summary: ON THREE OCCASIONS, CENTER CAPS ON FRONT SPORT RIMS HAVE POPPED OFF DURING DRIVING. HAVE HAD TO ORDER 3 DIFFERENT TIMES FROM DEALER FOR NEW ONES AND THEY STILL DENY THAT ANY OTHER CONSUMERS HAVE COMPLAINED ABOUT THE PROBLEM. I PERSONALLY HAVE NOTICED OTHER RAM TRUCKS (EVEN ONE AT THE DEALERSHIP) WITH MISSING CENTER CAPS SO THIS MUST BE SOME KIND OF PROBLEM. ONLY HAPPENS TO FRONT TIRES BUT ALL WHEELS WHEN ROTATED TO FRONT. TS
